Uses of Interface
com.threerings.media.timer.MediaTimer

Packages that use MediaTimer
com.threerings.media   
com.threerings.media.timer

Uses of MediaTimer in com.threerings.media
 

Methods in com.threerings.media that return MediaTimer
static MediaTimer FrameManager.createTimer()
          Attempts to create a high resolution timer, but if that isn't possible, uses a System.currentTimeMillis based timer.
 

Methods in com.threerings.media with parameters of type MediaTimer
static FrameManager FrameManager.newInstance(FrameManager.ManagedRoot root, MediaTimer timer)
          Constructs a frame manager that will do its rendering to the supplied root and use the supplied media timer for timing information.
 

Uses of MediaTimer in com.threerings.media.timer
 

Classes in com.threerings.media.timer that implement MediaTimer
 class CalibratingTimer
          Calibrates timing values from a subclass' implementation of current against those returned by System.currentTimeMillis.
 class MillisTimer
          Implements the MediaTimer interface using System.currentTimeMillis() to obtain timing information.
 class NanoTimer
          Uses the System.nanoTime() method introduced in 1.5 to try to obtain higher resolution timestamps than those available via System.currentTimeMillis().
 class PerfTimer
          Deprecated. Use NanoTimer instead.
 

Uses of MediaTimer in com.threerings.media.util
 

Methods in com.threerings.media.util with parameters of type MediaTimer
static void PerformanceMonitor.setMediaTimer(MediaTimer timer)
          Used to configure the performance monitor with a particular MediaTimer implementation.
